testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: when clicking on the profile icon in the admin panel's top bar, the window should display the Password link.
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user verifies that they are on the mainLogin page..................passed And The user clicks on the Admin Login button...............................passed And The user switchs to an other new Admin Login page.......................passed And The user enters their mail address and password to the mailtextbox and passwordtextbox.passed And The user clicks on the Sign In button...................................passed And The user clicks on the profile icon on the admin panels top bar.........passed And The user clicks on the password link....................................passed Then The user verifies that, the password link opens a page with Current Password, New Password, Confirm Password text boxes, and a Change Password button..passed
